EmailTemplate.description: Whenever a new solution is created and ready for validation, this email template is sent
EmailTemplate.name: IDFS_Solution validation
EmailTemplate.subject: New solution has been created! Solution no {!Solution.SolutionNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Receiving_User.FirstName}, A new solution has been created and is ready for validation by your region and a Task has thus been assigned to you.
{!Solution.SolutionNumber} {!Solution.SolutionName} {!Solution.SolutionNote}
Should the solution be applicable in your region, please take the following steps:
Click on this link {!Solution.Link} Click on Select Categories in the Solution Categories section Select the categories applicable for your region Save Select Send an Email Select Select Template Select the template 'Solution validated - applicable' Send Close the Task Should the solution not be applicable in the region, please take the following steps:
Click on this link {!Solution.Link} Select Send an Email Select Select Template Select the template 'Solution validated - not applicable' Send Close the Task Should you have any comments on the solution that you would like to discuss before approving for your region, please take the following steps:
Click on this link {!Solution.Link} Select Send an Email Select Select Template Select the template 'Solution validation - comments' Send
Krgds, {!User.Name} {!User.Email}
